Essentially : Is IgG-dependent cell activation associate presence anti-phospholipid antibody ( subtypes ? ) , profile indicate something beyond nosology anti-phospholipid syndrome ?
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria patient : The patient give informed sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan Adult woman 18 50 year old At least one prior incident proximal venous thromboembolism ( proximal deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolism ) three month ago regardless patient 's history placental vascular disease Exclusion Criteria patient : The patient participate another interventional study , participate another interventional study within past 3 month The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , adult guardianship It impossible correctly inform patient , patient refuse sign consent Postmenopausal woman Pregnancy within last 3 month Isolated history superficial venous thrombosis Isolated history distal venous thrombosis History malignancy ( solid hematological ) Known positive serology hepatitis B Known positive serology hepatitis C Known positive serology human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Episode inflammatory infectious disease date back less 3 month Impaired liver function characterize liver enzymes ( Alanine aminotransferase/ Aspartate aminotransferase ) great 3 time normal Impaired renal function test characterize glomerular filtration rate 80 ml / min Drug background therapy ( antiplatelet anticoagulant therapy ) use treatment autoimmune disease Inclusion Criteria healthy volunteer : The healthy volunteer give informed sign consent The healthy volunteer must insure beneficiary health insurance plan Adult woman 18 50 year old A history least one normal pregnancy define birth child bear alive absence placental vascular complication Exclusion Criteria healthy volunteer : The healthy volunteer participate another interventional study , participate another interventional study within past 3 month The healthy volunteer exclusion period determine previous study The healthy volunteer judicial protection , adult guardianship It impossible correctly inform healthy volunteer , healthy volunteer refuse sign consent Postmenopausal woman Pregnancy within last 3 month History superficial venous thrombosis History distal venous thrombosis History malignancy ( solid hematological ) Known positive serology hepatitis B Known positive serology hepatitis C Known positive serology human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Episode inflammatory infectious disease date back less 3 month Impaired liver function characterize liver enzymes ( Alanine aminotransferase/ Aspartate aminotransferase ) great 3 time normal Impaired renal function test characterize glomerular filtration rate 80 ml / min Background drug treatment History proximal venous thromboembolism History placental vascular disease
